job.title: Sr. Backend Software Engineer (100% remote; Relo to San Francisco post-Covid)
job.description: Founded in 2008 our Customer represents a global travel community that offers magical endtoend trips including where you stay what you do and the people you meet They exist to create a world where anyone can belong anywhere providing healthy travel that is local authentic diverse inclusive and sustainable Their website and app uniquely leverage technology to economically empower millions of people around the world to unlock and monetize their spaces passions and talents to become hospitality entrepreneursltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for a ltstronggtSr Backend Software Engineerltstronggt on a ltstronggtltemgtcontract basisltemgtltstronggt This role will build critical functionality that saves us about USDX million annually and improves SMS reliability In addition this role will also help us improve our vendor operations work like changing SMS shortcodes for certain countries updating APIs based on vendor updatesltbrgtltulgtltligt This role will be remote while
